code: import React from'react';import{Button,Col,DatePicker,Row}from'antd';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import{setBookingData}from'redux/slices/booking';import{shallowEqual,useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const tabs=[{label:'all',value:'1'},{label:'available',value:'2'},{label:'booked',value:'3'},{label:'occupied',value:'4'}];const Filter=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const dispatch=useDispatch();const{data}=useSelector(state=>state.booking,shallowEqual);const onChange=(_,dateString)=>{dispatch(setBookingData({free_from:JSON.stringify(dateString)}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"booking_header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"booking_title",children:t('Tables')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DatePicker,{showTime:true,onChange:onChange,format:"YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm",className:"booking_date"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{gutter:12,children:tabs.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{span:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:data.current_tab===item.label?'primary':'',onClick:()=>dispatch(setBookingData({current_tab:item.label})),className:"booking_header_button",children:t(item.label)})},idx))})]});};export default Filter;
